full_summary:
================================#
### Tender Notification
================================#

#### Title
Concrete Restoration RISO
#### Reference Number
WS3964455859-Doc3966059646

#### Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for Concrete Restoration services. This RISO is for a 1-year Initial Period with 4, 1-year option periods.

#### Open to:
The tender is open to contractors from Canada, Czech Republic, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Israel, Jamaica, Jordan, Mexico, Morocco, Nicaragua, Panama, Peru, United Kingdom, United States, and Ukraine.

#### Scope of Work
The contractor is expected to provide all labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to perform miscellaneous concrete work, concrete restoration, and epoxy injection work on concrete and masonry surfaces for the interior and exterior of buildings, grounds, and works at CFB Halifax.

#### Request for Proposal
This tender opportunity is a competitive open bidding process. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price received.

#### Contact Information
Contracting Authority:
Jonathan Bullard, PSPC
jonathan.bullard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Documents
Please visit the link below to access the tender documents:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16001409?extsite=MTYwMDE0MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Closing Date
Tender submissions are due on 2023-05-10 at 14:00:00.
